Public Remarks: Brock House is one of the heritage designated properties in Chilliwack. This was the first home built by a prominent local builder Robert Harvey Brock for himself. From the inviting front porch to the main level, a spacious family room provides access to an office completing with a fireplace. The living and dining rooms connect along to the kitchen.
